import {Fragment} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default function CartPage({CartItems,setCartItems}){ function increaseCount(item){ if (item.count>0 && item.count { if (i.product._id == item.prduct._id){ i.count++ } return i; }) } } function decreaseCount(){ if (item.count>1){ setCount((state) => state+1) } } return

Your Cart: {CartItems.length} Items

{CartItems.map( (item) => (
{item.product.name}

{item.product.price}

decreaseCount(item)}>- increaseCount(item)}>+
) )}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

}
